title: Discussion with Mary Kochan - Von Hildebrand, Reverence, Values and Quality
description:
Mary Kochan compares Dietrich Von Hildebrandt's Reverence with Pirsig's Quality and more!

Mary's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2leFZRD0ZlQDQxpR2Zd8oA

Much of the discussion involved the book Liturgy and Personality

https://youtu.be/2XhsCw2K3_M
